org.jtrim.image.transform

Enum ZoomToFitOption

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<ZoomToFitOption>
      • org.jtrim.image.transform.ZoomToFitOption
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<ZoomToFitOption>

    public enum ZoomToFitOption
extends java.lang.Enum<ZoomToFitOption>
    Defines the possible rules which should be applied when scaling an image to fit a particular display.

    Note that usually you need to specify at least FIT_HEIGHT or FIT_WIDTH, otherwise it is ill-defined what an implementation should do.

    Warning: New rules can be added at any time and rules can be ignored by the using code if it does not support or recognize a particular rule.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      FIT_HEIGHT
      Means that the image need to be scaled so that no part of the image should be beyond the top or bottom side of the display.
      FIT_WIDTH
      Means that the image need to be scaled so that no part of the image should be beyond the left or right side of the display.
      KEEP_ASPECT_RATIO
      Means that the width/height ratio of the image must not be changed when scaling.
      MAY_MAGNIFY
      Means that the image need to be magnified if necessary to fit the display.

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • KEEP_ASPECT_RATIO

        public static final ZoomToFitOption KEEP_ASPECT_RATIO
        Means that the width/height ratio of the image must not be changed when scaling. If this rule is not applied, implementations may stretch the image in both dimensions to fit the display.

      • MAY_MAGNIFY

        public static final ZoomToFitOption MAY_MAGNIFY
        Means that the image need to be magnified if necessary to fit the display. If this rule is not applied, the image will only be shrinked but will never be magnified.

      • FIT_WIDTH

        public static final ZoomToFitOption FIT_WIDTH
        Means that the image need to be scaled so that no part of the image should be beyond the left or right side of the display.

      • FIT_HEIGHT

        public static final ZoomToFitOption FIT_HEIGHT
        Means that the image need to be scaled so that no part of the image should be beyond the top or bottom side of the display.
